sqlMap.sql: SELECT a.* ,(SELECT NAME from room_class where ROOM_CLASS = a.ROOM_CLASS ) as CLASS_NAME FROM ROOM a
sqlMap.select: ORDER BY a.ROOM_CLASS ASC, a.NO ASC

WHERE NO NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT NO FROM ROOM_RESERVATION WHERE FIRSTDATE between #firstDate# and #lastDate# or LASTDATE between #firstDate# and #lastDate# ) AND a.ROOM_CAPACITY >= #people# ORDER BY a.ROOM_CLASS ASC, a.NO ASC

WHERE NO NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT NO FROM ROOM_RESERVATION WHERE FIRSTDATE between #firstDate# and #lastDate# or LASTDATE between #firstDate# and #lastDate# ) AND a.ROOM_CAPACITY = #people# ORDER BY a.ROOM_CLASS ASC, a.NO ASC

SELECT a.* ,(SELECT NAME from room_class where ROOM_CLASS = a.ROOM_CLASS ) as CLASS_NAME FROM ROOM a WHERE NO NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT NO FROM ROOM_RESERVATION WHERE FIRSTDATE between #firstDate# and #lastDate# or LASTDATE between #firstDate# and #lastDate# ) AND a.ROOM_CAPACITY >= #people# AND a.ROOM_CLASS = #rcType# ORDER BY a.ROOM_CLASS ASC, a.NO ASC

SELECT a.* ,(SELECT NAME from room_class where ROOM_CLASS = a.ROOM_CLASS ) as CLASS_NAME FROM ROOM a WHERE NO NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT NO FROM ROOM_RESERVATION WHERE FIRSTDATE between #firstDate# and #lastDate# or LASTDATE between #firstDate# and #lastDate# ) AND a.ROOM_CAPACITY = #people# AND a.ROOM_CLASS = #rcType# ORDER BY a.ROOM_CLASS ASC, a.NO ASC
